Package org.eclipse.imagen.media.serialize

Class SerializableStateImpl

Object
SerializableStateImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, SerializableState
Direct Known Subclasses:
ColorModelState, DataBufferState, HashSetState, HashtableState, RasterState, RenderContextState, RenderingHintsState, RenderingKeyState, SampleModelState, ShapeState, VectorState
public abstract class SerializableStateImpl extends Object implements SerializableState
Framework class for adding Serializers based on SerializableState implementations which support one or more classes or interfaces.

Extending classes MUST:

  1. be public;
  2. provide a single public constructor with exactly the same signature as the protected constructor of this class;
  3. provide a static override of getSupportedClasses();
  4. implement the (de)serialization methods writeObject() and readObject(); and
  5. add the class to SerializerImpl.registerSerializers() as 
           registerSerializers(MySerializableState.class);
Since:
1.1
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • getSupportedClasses

      public static Class[] getSupportedClasses()
      Returns the classes supported by this SerializableState. Subclasses MUST override this method with their own STATIC method.

    • permitsSubclasses

      public static boolean permitsSubclasses()
      Whether the SerializableStateImpl permits its Serializer to serialize subclasses of the supported class(es). Subclasses SHOULD override this method to return "true" with their own STATIC method IF AND ONLY IF they support subclass serialization.
